Urgot.name: Urgotº
Urgot.title: ºøthe Headsman's Prideøº
Urgot.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºThere are warriors who become great for their strength, cunning, or skill with arms. Others simply refuse to die. Urgot, once a great soldier of Noxus, may constitute a case in support of the latter. Prone to diving headlong into enemy battle lines, Urgot sowed chaos throughout the enemy ranks, often sustaining grievous injuries in the process. When his body was unable to weather further abuse, the crippled Urgot was delegated the position of High Executioner of Noxus. By this time, his hands had been ruined and he could barely walk. Scythe-like grafts affixed to his maimed limbs served to carry out his bloody work.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøUrgot finally met his end at what should have been his finest hour. Because of his military background, he often accompanied detachments into foreign territory to carry out judgment. After ambushing an enemy force, Jarvan IV, Crown Prince of Demacia, fell into the clutches of Urgot's division. Too far from Noxus to risk transporting their prize for ransom, Urgot prepared to dispose of their captive. At the final moment, however, the Dauntless Vanguard, led by Garen, the Might of Demacia, intervened, and Urgot was cut in two by the zealous warrior as he scrambled to free his Prince. In recognition of his service, the executioner's remains were remanded to the Bleak Academy for reanimation. A lifetime of abuse, however, had left his body in a catastrophic state; proving problematic to the necromancers' craft. Professor Stanwick Pididly, the prevailing scholar of Zaun, offered a solution. Within Pididly's laboratories, a nightmarish new body was forged for Urgot. Now as much machine as man, Urgot arrived at the League of Legends in search of the man who ended his life; necromantic energies coursing through his metal veins.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøº''We can rebuild him. We have the techmaturgy.''ºøºøº
ºøº-- Professor Stanwick Pididlyºøº
Urgot.blurb: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºThere are warriors who become great for their strength, cunning, or skill with arms.  Others simply refuse to die.  Urgot, once a great soldier of Noxus, may constitute a case in support ...
allytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøPrior to firing Acid Hunter, try hovering over an enemy afflicted by Noxian Corrosive Charge. Upon launching, the Acid Hunter will ignore all other enemies and fly directly to the corroding target.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºUrgot is a great skirmisher. Try hitting his enemies with Noxian Corrosive Charge followed by multiple missile-locked Acid Hunters.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº
enemytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøKeep moving to avoid being hit by Urgot's Noxian Corrosive Charge. If you are afflicted by his corrosive charge, quickly move out of range to avoid his Acid Hunter Missiles.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøUrgot gains slowing attacks while his Terror Capacitor shield is operational. Damage him enough to remove his shield so he loses this effect.øºøºøºøºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºAcid Hunterº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøUrgot fires an Acid Hunter missile that collides with the first enemy it hits, slowing the target if he has his Terror Capacitor up. Acid Hunter missile-locks on enemies affected by Noxian Corrosive Charge.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøºøºUrgot fires a missile toward the cursor that deals ºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºø physical damage.º

ºøºøºøºøºøMissile-lock can be achieved by holding the cursor over a target afflicted by Noxian Corrosive Charge.øºøºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºøTerror Capacitorº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøUrgot charges up his capacitor to gain a shield. While the shield is active, Urgot gains slowing attacks.ºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøºøºUrgot charges up his terror capacitor to gain a shield that absorbs ºøºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºøºøºøºø damage for 7 seconds. While the shield is active, Urgot's attacks and missiles slow targets by ºøºøºøºøº{{ e2 }}%. º

spells.name: ºøNoxian Corrosive Chargeºøº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºUrgot launches a corrosive charge that damages enemies in an area and reduces their armor.ºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøUrgot launches a Corrosive Charge at a target location. Enemies afflicted by the charge have their armor reduced by ºøºøºøºøºøº{{ e2 }}º% and take º{{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }})ºø physical damage over øº{{ e3 }}º seconds.º

ºøºøºøºøAcid Hunter is able to missile-lock onto targets affected by Noxian Corrosive Charge.ºøºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºøºHyper-Kinetic Position Reverserºøº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºUrgot charges up his Hyper-Kinetic Position Reverser, swapping positions with the target.  His target is suppressed for the duration of the channel. He gains increased armor and magic resistance after the swap.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøUrgot targets an enemy champion and channels his Hyper-Kinetic Position Reverser for 1 second, swapping locations with his target afterward. His target is suppressed for the duration of the channel.øºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºUrgot gains º{{ e2 }}ºøºøºøºøºøºø armor and magic resist during and after the channel, and his target is slowed by 40% for 3 seconds after being swapped.øºøºøºøºøºøº

passive.name: ºøZaun-Touched Bolt Augmenterºøº
passive.description: ºøºøºøºøºUrgot's basic attacks and Acid Hunters reduce his targets' damage by 15% for 2.5 seconds.ºøºøºøºøº
